titleStmt.title: Certaine letters declaring in part the passage of affaires in the Palatinate, from September to this present moneth of April Together, with the articles of agreement betweene the princes of the Vnion and the Lord Marquis Spinola.
titleStmt.author: I. B.

notesStmt.note: Three of the letters signed: I.B.
Identified as STC 19127 on UMI microfilm reel 1553.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and the Bodleian Library.
Appears at reel 1370 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy) and at reel 1553 (Bodleian Library copy).
